stories.title: Troubleshooting memory leaks: deep dive into common heap profilers

stories.text: These wall-based hearing aids would know where everyone is in the home and increase the volume locally only for those who need it. In this way, there would be no need for someone to shout at someone else and the local volume increase would not affect people with normal hearing.
stories.title: Ask HN: Could homes have wall-based hearing aids that track people around?

The US Marines Got Rid of Their Tanks. Is Ukraine Making Them Look Smart?

stories.text:
I just found out that Kickstarter calls people that list projects on their platform creatives. But I don't think that's an apt word because you also call online video content creators creatives as well. I think there is a distinction between the two. I would consider Kickstarter creatives lean more towards the startup side than video content. They produce physical and/or digital goods that can be sold.

What word should I use to describe these people?
stories.title: Ask HN: What do you call people that do Kickstarters?
Elliott and Brookfield to Buy Nielsen for $10B
